question: For the publisher that has the lightest bad-aligned superhero with a recorded weight, what is the standard unsolicited submissions response time (in weeks) stated in its submissions guidelines?
nl2sql_question: Which publisher publishes the lightest bad-aligned superhero whose weight is known (non-null and greater than zero)?
sql_answer: SELECT p.publisher_name FROM superhero AS sh JOIN publisher AS p ON sh.publisher_id = p.id JOIN alignment AS a ON sh.alignment_id = a.id WHERE sh.weight_kg IS NOT NULL AND sh.weight_kg > 0 AND UPPER(a.alignment) = 'BAD' ORDER BY sh.weight_kg ASC, p.publisher_name ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Submissions Guidelines for the identified publisher — narrative policy text that states the standard response time, in weeks, for unsolicited submissions (pitches/manuscripts), including any default timeframe used when no exceptions apply.

question: For the publisher associated with the tallest female superhero who has both Flight and Telepathy and a recorded height, what is the standard invoice payment term (in days) stated in its vendor payment policy?
nl2sql_question: Which publisher is linked to the tallest female superhero who possesses both the Flight and Telepathy powers and has a non-null, non-zero recorded height?
sql_answer: SELECT p.publisher_name FROM superhero s JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id JOIN gender g ON s.gender_id = g.id WHERE g.gender = 'Female' AND s.height_cm IS NOT NULL AND s.height_cm > 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hero_power hp JOIN superpower sp ON hp.power_id = sp.id WHERE hp.hero_id = s.id AND sp.power_name = 'Flight') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hero_power hp2 JOIN superpower sp2 ON hp2.power_id = sp2.id WHERE hp2.hero_id = s.id AND sp2.power_name = 'Telepathy') ORDER BY s.height_cm DESC, p.publisher_name ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Vendor Payment Policy or Accounts Payable terms for the identified publisher — narrative clause that states the standard invoice payment term in days (e.g., Net 30) for freelancers/contractors.

question: For the publisher associated with the superhero who has the highest Combat attribute among blond-haired heroes, what is the maximum gift value an employee may accept without prior approval in its ethics policy?
nl2sql_question: Which publisher is associated with the superhero who has the highest Combat attribute among heroes with blond hair?
sql_answer: SELECT p.publisher_name FROM hero_attribute ha JOIN attribute a ON ha.attribute_id = a.id JOIN superhero s ON ha.hero_id = s.id JOIN colour c ON s.hair_colour_id = c.id JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id WHERE a.attribute_name = 'Combat' AND c.colour = 'Blond' ORDER BY ha.attribute_value DESC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Ethics and compliance policy (gifts and entertainment) for the identified publisher—narrative section that explicitly states the maximum dollar amount employees may accept as a gift without prior approval, including any broad exceptions and the effective date.

question: For the publisher associated with the heaviest red-eyed Android superhero with a recorded weight, what is the default password expiration period (in days) stated in its IT security policy?
nl2sql_question: Which publisher is linked to the heaviest superhero who is of race 'Android', has red eyes, and has a recorded (non-null, non-zero) weight?
sql_answer: SELECT p.publisher_name FROM superhero s JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id JOIN race r ON s.race_id = r.id JOIN colour ce ON s.eye_colour_id = ce.id WHERE r.race = 'Android' AND ce.colour = 'Red' AND s.weight_kg IS NOT NULL AND s.weight_kg > 0 ORDER BY s.weight_kg DESC, s.superhero_name ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: IT Security or Password Policy for the identified publisher — narrative policy text that explicitly states the standard/default password expiration period for regular user accounts (e.g., “passwords expire every 90 days”), providing a single, organization-wide value; ignore any exceptions for privileged or service accounts.

question: For the publisher associated with the shortest male, green-haired superhero who has both Invisibility and Super Speed and a recorded height, what is the default email retention period (in days) in its data retention policy?
nl2sql_question: Which publisher is linked to the shortest male superhero with green hair who possesses both Invisibility and Super Speed and has a non-missing height?
sql_answer: SELECT p.publisher_name FROM superhero s JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id JOIN gender g ON s.gender_id = g.id JOIN colour hc ON s.hair_colour_id = hc.id JOIN hero_power hp1 ON s.id = hp1.hero_id JOIN superpower sp1 ON hp1.power_id = sp1.id JOIN hero_power hp2 ON s.id = hp2.hero_id JOIN superpower sp2 ON hp2.power_id = sp2.id WHERE g.gender = 'Male' AND hc.colour = 'Green' AND sp1.power_name = 'Invisibility' AND sp2.power_name = 'Super Speed' AND s.height_cm IS NOT NULL AND s.height_cm > 0 ORDER BY s.height_cm ASC LIMIT 1;
doc_desc: Data Retention Policy (or Records Management Policy) for the identified publisher — narrative text that specifies the organization-wide default email retention period expressed as a single duration in days (the baseline policy value; not a table, and not an exception-specific period).
